column4: Ministry of Health announced a new case of  Covid-19. The diagnosed patient is a 27-year-old woman from Vietnam
column5: who is now in Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital. She arrived in Cambodia on March 10
column6: and had been staying in Bavet.------At the same time
column7: the ministry also announced that five more people have recovered from the virus.------Cambodia has found a total of 115 cases of Covid-19
column9: and 57 are still hospitalized. No deaths have been recorded.
